attributes.action: Islington Council plan to extend parking controls and we are opposed to the plan
attributes.additional_details: The councils claims are simply not true, there are events at the Emirates a max. of 32 days per year and so there can be no justification for 'match day' controls 365 days per year.
attributes.background: Islington Council want to extend parking controls in the Borough to 8:30am - 9pm seven days a week. They claim this is due to more home games and events and the Emirates Stadium. We the undersigned believe this is unnecessary and will damage local businesses.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Islington Council. You can find out more about starting a petition to Islington Council here:

http://democracy.islington.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1

You could also contact local councillors about this. You can use this page to find out who the local councillors are and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
